questions.question: Why does the entire community go to the auditorium?
The four qualifications for becoming the next Receiver of Memory are:

choices.answer: Wisdom, Strength, Fear, having the name Jonas
Being a Twelve, Sarcastic, Can take pain, Emotional

questions.question: A name Not-to-Be-Spoken indicates the highest degree of disgrace. Who's name is not spoken?
Jonas felt __________ when he received his Assignement.

choices.answer: Excited - because he would his Assignment is high in rank
Apprehensive - because he wants to work with Asher
Proud - because he will represent his community
Fear - because he did not know what the selection meant

questions.question: As Lily becomes an Eight, she will begin:
How was Gabe given more time in the community? (Choose TWO answers)

choices.answer: He became strong and healthy and was put into a family unit
He wasn't given more time, he was released
He would spend nights with Jonas's Family Unit
Jonas's family signed a pledge not to become attatched

questions.question: Caleb was a replacement child. Who did Caleb replace, and what happened to that child?

choices.answer: Caleb, he fell into the river

questions.question: What did bicycles signify?

choices.answer: Children were moving up into the community
Children could travel to other communities

questions.question: Asher was punished for mixing the words "snack" and "smack", why?

choices.answer: The Elders liked to pick on Asher

questions.question: Why was the Ceremony of Twelve more important that all the others?

choices.answer: You get your Assignment, and become one step from adulthood
You get your Assignment and leave the Community
You receive knowledge from the past
You get your Assignment and become an adult

questions.question: What is Loss?

choices.answer: When a child leaves a Family Unit
When a member of the Community is poisoned
When a member of the Community dies (the boy in the river)

questions.question: One of the Rules for the Receiver of Memory is:

choices.answer: You may not converse with Members of the Communittee

questions.question: The Annex was different from all the other buildings, why?

choices.answer: The door was locked. All other buildings are unlocked
The Annex had symbols on the walls

questions.question: What memories does the Receiver have?
Why is the Receiver so tired and look so old?

choices.answer: He weighed down by the memories
He is the oldest member of the Community

questions.question: Why didn't Jonas understand pain?

choices.answer: Jonas has not lived long enough to understand pain
Pain does not exist in the Communty
Children are not required to feel pain
Members of the Community cannot remember pain in their life

questions.question: The first memory the Receiver gave to Jonas was _______.
Jonas didn't know what a _________  was.
What are on the walls of the Annex?
Who selected Jonas for his Assignment?
